pages.text: $(marked)Attack Spells$() are for some the most important spells, as they basically grant ranged attack with almost no cost.$(br)Every Soul has its own attack spell, though they commonly only differ in their damage type.$(br)Some attack spells even have special effects.

pages.title: Nullifying Projectile
pages.text: The attack spell of the $(marked)Immutable Soul$() is technically able to destroy other arcane projectiles; however, it is very unlikely to hit.

pages.title: Ancient Call
pages.text: The attack spell of the $(marked)Ancient Soul$() will spread out like a wave, and will deal psychic damage (like the attack spell of the $(marked)Unstable Soul$()).$(br)Its projectiles are also piercing.

pages.title: Dragon's Breath
pages.text: The attack spell of the $(marked)Dragon Soul$() can be cast without any cooldown, and spreads out like a dragon's edema.$(br)It is capable of dealing huge amount of damage to masses of enemies in close range.
